description: Validation rules for the FAANG project. Rules are divided into one group that is applied to all samples, and additional groups based on the sample type. In addition to rules defined individually, attribute names are imported from the VT, ATOL and EOL ontologies.
title: FAANG experiments core metadata rules
name: faang_experiments_core

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

enum: methylation profiling by high throughput sequencing
microRNA profiling by high throughput sequencing
transcription profiling by high throughput sequencing

sample_storage.name: sample storage
sample_storage.description: How the sample was stored. Temperatures are in celsius. 'Frozen, vapor phase' refers to storing samples above liquid nitrogen in the vapor.

sample_storage_processing.name: sample storage processing
sample_storage_processing.description: How the sample was prepared for storage.

enum: cryopreservation of live cells in liquid nitrogen

sampling_to_preparation_interval.name: sampling to preparation interval
sampling_to_preparation_interval.description: How long between the sample being taken and the assay experiment preperations commencing. If sample preperations were then left in intermediate stages after preperation commenced, for example as sheared chromatin, then this should be made clear in your protocols.

experimental_protocol.name: experimental protocol
experimental_protocol.description: Link to the description of the experiment protocol, an overview of the full experiment, that can refer to the order in which other protocols were performed and any intermediate steps not covered by the extraction or assay specific protocols.

extraction_protocol.name: extraction protocol
extraction_protocol.description: Link to the protocol used to isolate the extract material.

library_preparation_location.name: library preparation location
library_preparation_location.description: Location where library preperation was performed.

library_preparation_location_longitude.name: library preparation location longitude
library_preparation_location_longitude.description: Longitude of the library prep location in decimal degrees.

library_preparation_location_latitude.name: library preparation location latitude
library_preparation_location_latitude.description: Latitude of the library prep location in decimal degrees.

library_preparation_date.name: library preparation date
library_preparation_date.description: Date on which the library was prepared.

sequencing_location.name: sequencing location
sequencing_location.description: Location of where the sequencing was performed.

sequencing_location_longitude.name: sequencing location longitude
sequencing_location_longitude.description: Longitude of the sequencing location in decimal degrees.

sequencing_location_latitude.name: sequencing location latitude
sequencing_location_latitude.description: Latitude of the sequencing location in decimal degrees.
